bibl.title: Two Greek Wartetexte from the Cambridge Genizah Collection.

series.title: Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève.

bibl.note: Cambrige University Library, Taylor-Schechter Collection, Inv. 12.185 and AS.78.411. Two parchment scraps with upper texts in Hebrew and lower texts in Greek (respectively written in "Alexandrian" and "Biblical majuscule", assigned to the 6th-7th and late 5th-6th centuries). Diplomatic transcription of the Greek texts (possibly copied in Egypt); their contents defied all identification so far.

bibl.title: Κορυφαίῳ ἀνδρί. Mélanges offerts à André Hurst

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Cambr. Univ. Libr. Inv. TS 12.185; Inv. TS AS.78.411
TCHERNETSKA Natalie, Two Greek Wartetexte from the Cambridge Genizah Collection.

Antje KOLDE, Alessandra LUKINOVICH et André-Louis REY (Édd.), Κορυφαίῳ ἀνδρί. Mélanges offerts à André Hurst = Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève. 22 (Genève, 2005) pp. 527-531.

Cambrige University Library, Taylor-Schechter Collection, Inv. 12.185 and AS.78.411. Two parchment scraps with upper texts in Hebrew and lower texts in Greek (respectively written in "Alexandrian" and "Biblical majuscule", assigned to the 6th-7th and late 5th-6th centuries). Diplomatic transcription of the Greek texts (possibly copied in Egypt); their contents defied all identification so far.
